In Zające na łące ("Hares in the meadow") every player controls two out of four hares. It may happen that some hares are controlled by two players. On a turn a player chooses one card from hand and moves proper hare.

The game ends after 3. round. At the end of each round hares are awarded points. Hares can also earn points during the race by landing on a carrot. The player who has the most point at the end of the game is the winner.

201929.name: Adventures in Wonderland #1: Chasing the White Rabbit (Hero Kids)
201929.description:
From publisher blurb:

On a lazy, do-nothing day the relaxed cloud-gazing of a group of young adventurers is interrupted by the mysterious appearance of a strange, teleporting white rabbit. What follows might be the oddest game of tag ever played, as the adventurers chase the white rabbit through a peculiar and colorful wood only to run afoul of an angry tree. Welcome to Adventures in Wonderland, a family-friendly mini-adventure path for Hero Kids!

Adventures in Wonderland: Chasing the White Rabbit is a fun After School Adventure. After School Adventures are adventure shorts designed to only take a few hours of time to complete.

201931.name: The New York Reclamation Zone
201931.description:
From publisher blurb:

The best city money can buy!

Once the greatest city on earth, New York was abandoned in 2038 after terrorists blew the levees protecting her from rising sea levels. Forgotten by America, the Big Apple became soggy, slowly rotting away, with only a brave few remaining within its bounds, refusing to give up their once-proud home. Yet in the half-century that followed, New Yorkers proved time and again just how adaptable they could be in the face of disaster, natural or otherwise.

Now, the waters may still hold the Big Soggy hostage, but its denizens reject any notion of surrender. The city has changed, with flooded streets and ancient subways teeming with aquatic predators while human colonies scrape out a brutal existence on those skyscrapers that haven’t collapsed into the sea. As corporations turn their hungry eyes on the forgotten city, it’s time to rediscover the Big Soggy, where new territory is being fought over, new hybrids are emerging from the waves, new technology is being manufactured in the blackest labs, and new secrets are being dug up from the ocean floor—or buried there.

It remains a city of survivors. The only question is, how long will you last there?

In this 57-page book you’ll find:

A detailed look at New York city, Newark, and their inhabitants.
New character archetypes
Occupation
Edges
Weapons, armor and equipment
A host of hazards, bio-horrors and NPCs common to the region!

201932.name: Abyssal Hordes
201932.description:
From publisher blurb:

Why Settle For Standard Demons?

Mortals come in a wide variety of shapes and sizes, so why shouldn’t demons? With dozens of alternate racial traits for every PC race, why does every single quasit have the same suite of spell-like abilities? If elves, dwarves, and humans can have class levels, why can’t dretches, glabrezu, and balors?

This book presents a variety of unique demons, from the lowliest dretches up to the mighty balors, presenting each one with a flavorful description and backstory, as well as mechanical differences that set them apart from others of their kind, including several that have class levels and full statistics entries.

Whether you’re a player looking for exciting new options for planar binding and even summon monster spells, or a GM who wants a more interesting infernal encounter, look no further than the infernal legions!

201933.name: Steam and Steel
201933.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Power of Steam, The Strength of Steel

It is an age of technological miracles. The scientists of London’s Royal Society have uncovered the secrets of steam power, steel machines, and the biological and mental mechanisms of life itself. The mind of man stretches beyond the physical and into the metaphysical. It is there, in the dimensions beyond man’s five senses, that dwell the Vril. And only the Steam Knights of the Royal Society can fight the power of the Vril Hussars from the Hollow Earth!

This supplement contains enough setting material to please any fan of the genre:

A system-neutral Victorian Steampunk setting, usable for any role-playing system. This setting features a timeline of the scientific developments of the Victorian era; the major conspiracies and secret societies of the time, such as the 13 Illuminati bloodlines that control the world; and multiple role-playing options for Her Imperial Majesty Victoria and Prince Consort Albert, as either heroes or villains. The author has strived to keep this setting historically accurate while still making it easily accessible to players and gamemasters.
Details on the Vril, serpent-man scientific sorcerers from the Hollow Earth dimension. These “secret masters” pull the strings of the Masons, Illuminati, and dozens of other diabolical forces in the world.
Steampunk versions of historical figures such as the two great Charleses, Darwin and Babbage, Countess Ida Lovelace, and the Royal Society of scientists, united as “Her Majesty’s Steam Knights”.
Campaign seeds and ideas for gamemasters, such as using this setting as an alternate time-travel scenario or exploring how our modern world diverges due to the presence of steam technology




For fans of “Mecha vs Kaiju” and the Fate Core system, there is a wealth of additional information:

Statblocks for famous historical figures, fictional Victorian figures (Dr. Moreau and his Beast Men, Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, the beheaded “Man Who Would Be King”), and the evil Vril sorcerers, plus their warriors and dinosaur mounts.
“Blood Magic” rules for magical rituals.
Fate Organization rules for Anarchists, Freemasons, and the Royal Society.
A Steampunk Computer skill
A Gadgeteer stunt tree granting characters the ability to build, customize, and repair extraordinary devices.
Fate Core and Mecha vs Kaiju rules for “Steam-Powered Extras”.
MvK rules for Wheeled or Treaded vehicles and mecha.
MvK stats for steam-powered mecha and vehicles.

201934.name: Big Book of Kaiju Volume 1
201934.description:
From publisher blurb:

The “Big Book of Kaiju” is many things. It’s a collection of giant monsters culled from the annuls of movie history. Any fan of the genre will be able to recognize a favorite monster here. It is also a game master aid for the “Mecha vs. Kaiju” game, powered by Fate Core, offering statblocks for adversaries to throw against players. And finally it is an aid to players of “Mecha vs. Kaiju,” giving them an insiders look at how citizens of Japan and the world view the creatures that daily menace their lives.

If you play other Fate games it is unnecessary to have the Mecha vs Kaiju Core Book to use this supplement. Each kaiju is fully stated out with unique stunts and is usable in any Fate game. However, if you want your players to have a chance of beating any but the weakest version of these monsters, it's best to have a mecha at your side!

The ground shakes under their clawed feet. They are the Tochi no Kaiju, the Kaiju of the Land. Whether on the surface or underground these creatures are unmatched in power and savagery. But even among these titans there is one who stands above – Kaibutsu, the King of the Monsters. This sourcebook details the history and abilities of these legendary monsters, and provides detailed statblocks at multiple power levels, each one ready to run right off the page.

This supplement contains:

4 new land-based kaiju. Each kaiju is described as if written in the “real” Big Book of Kaiju, with commentary by contributors about their behavior, tactics, and biology. Each entry features detailed stat blocks, complete with rules for all stunts and mutations, at three power levels:
A level for starting Mecha vs Kaiju characters, or those who run MvK without Construction points. This power level is also appropriate for ANY Fate Core game.
A level for Experienced groups who have achieved Major Milestones.
An Endgame kaiju, in its final form, suitable campaign finales or gamemaster tantrums.
New statblocks for Kaibutsu, the King of Monsters, at his Birth, Showa-era, Heisei-era, and Millennium-era strength.
New kaiju Mutations, such as “Assassin’s Wind” and “Death from Below”.

201935.name: Furrier's Tale
201935.description:
From publisher blurb:

Your time in Queen’s Point has been productive and your level training is complete. As you relax in the Frothy Goblet Tavern & Inn you enjoy catching up with your compatriots over a steaming mug of mead! While you enjoy your time together you can’t help but overhear an interesting conversation at the next table over. A mountain man from his appearance is regaling a group of drunks about a foray into the wilderness and discovery of some old ruins. Those listening chime in with their thoughts on the potential for lost treasure…perhaps this guy may lead you to your next adventure?

This adventure setting was designed for 5th Edition AD&D for the Filbar Provincia Campaign for a group of 4-6 adventurers that are level 5-7. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system.

201936.name: The Saltwater Rose
201936.description:
From the introduction:

This game is about searching the world for the Saltwater Rose, a hidden and valuable artifact. It is played on the Internet and the ideal number of players is ten.

User summary:

Play setup involves determine exactly what the Saltwater Rose is - some type of valuable artifact that is being hunted. Play then involves making periodic posts (about weekly) to an online forum about locations, challenges, riddles, and so forth. The game rules describe the structure of these posts and how they are resolved. A previously-agreed-upon national lottery site is used to generate random numbers for play.

201937.name: Against the Night
201937.description:
From the introduction:

This LARP uses the "Veritas" system. If you wish your character to do something you are not able or willing to do, simply narrate the action preceded by the word "Veritas". For example, "Veritas: I punch you in the face.", or "Veritas: I passionately kiss you".

User summary:

Characters in the game are partially pre-generated (job defined); the remaining characterization is created through play. The game requires only a single room - optimally with two doors, one leading outside.

201938.name: And Not to Yield
201938.description:
User summary:

And Not to Yield includes several print-and-play handouts that define characters for play, as well as some general instructions for the judge. The game is set in Mythic Europe, a setting extensively developed for an unrelated tabletop roleplaying game; however, background materials are not presented in the LARP document.

201939.name: Skygger Over Danmark
201939.description:
Author's blurb:

There are so many things human beings do not understand - can not grasp. We are trying to create order out of chaos with scientific models, trying to find the big theory of everything. But all our models, all our explanations, are merely a veil or perhaps a shield to protect us. To forget about God, Jesus, Allah, Buddha or whomever else you think is holding a protective hand over us. The truth is that the gods lurking behind the known universe and in crevices in time; they see humanity as a burr to be removed.

Skygger Over Danmark is a classic Call of Cthulhu scenario of unspeakable horrors, perilous detective work, and the price to pay to learn the truth.

201940.name: Too Schuss à Tignes
201940.description:
Too Schuss is a boardgame that takes place in the Ski Resort of Tignes in France. The board represent the map of the ski resort.

Goal: Be the first player to end your skying day with the higher score.

Game is a race where you need to finish the day as quick as possible while optimizing your path down the ski trail to score points.

A lighter version of the rules is available for kids or player that want an easyer game.

201941.name: Three (2009)
201941.description:
User summary:

The game scenario is a fairly strained situation involving three prisoners isolated in cells, each with a telephone and a lever. Within this framework, play involves a series of one-on-one private conversations (via telephone) and a sort of "voting" process involving when and if to pull the lever.

201942.description:
Expansion for Massive Darkness containing:

4 Elemental miniatures (Air, Earth, Fire and Water);
8 Cards
201942.name: Massive Darkness: Enemy Box – Elementals

201943.name: Slægten
201943.description:
From the introduction:

"The huge man crashed through the undergrowth, broad shoulders cracking branches in his rush. He is oblivious to pain though his face is convulsed in horror and ecstatic astonishment. He collapses among the gnarled trees and stares up at the stars through the canopy. And he screams. And screams."

User summary:

A Copenhagen detective is hired to find an unknown and now missing person and return him to home. But the detective's usual technology and methods will not help him now...

The scenario is distributed as a ZIP archive containing nine PDF documents arranged topically. Several are intended for print-and-play distribution.

201944.name: The Chronicles of the Lejendary Earth Gazetteer
201944.description:
From the back of the book:
Planning a trip...?

Are the waters shark-infested?
Are the natives friendly? or cannibals?
What is the reputation of the kingdom?
Any local myths I should know about?
...and most importantly...
Any rumors of treasure? Artifacts?

Politics, Religion, commerce, geography, ocean currents, population, ancient myths and local legends...
...it's all here in this comprehensive book.
A must have for the 'know-before-you-go' avatar, or the lejend master that is starting a campaign. Packed with information and adventure ideas, the Gazetteer world sourcebook is the player's comprehensive portal to the Lejendary Earth of Gary Gygax

Only 200 signed and numbered copies were printed.

201945.description:
Sure, playing with the sponsors and teams that are presented in the rulebooks is fun, but Xtreme is all about breaking the mould, and what better way to do that than by creating your own sponsor and their own band of misfits from the ground up and throwing them into the fray?

This 80 page full colour book will show you how, and set you on the path to true Xtreme greatness!

Use any DreadBall Team in DreadBall Xtreme
Build your own custom DreadBall Team from ANY player in the DreadBall range
Rules for 4 New Sponsors, including: Kraato Gon, Dr Kain, The Shojuun and Rathmar.
Build your own custom Xtreme Sponsor
201945.name: Dreadball Xtreme Player Manual

201946.description:
Xtreme’s lack of rules and referees means an infinite amount of variety for the fans, not just in terms of the makeup of the teams, and the scattering of obstacles on the pitch, but the very shape of the playing area itself and even how many teams take part. Xtreme multi-team games make DreadBall Ultimate look like a Zee tea party. Play them out on some of the most infamous layouts ever devised, or come up with your own. Just remember, this isn’t a game, it’s war on a pitch.

This expansion includes:

24 Page Full Colour Xpansion Rulebook, which includes rules for:

Customizable Pitches
Dangerous New Traps
Multi-player Games
Medi-bots

A complete multi-part pitch, made of thick card tiles.

Xpansion Counters

Four Giant Players

1 Plastic Krastavor Giant miniature
1 Plastic Chovar Giant miniature
1 Plastic Sann-Gar Giant miniature
1 Plastic Iron Ancestor Giant miniatures
201946.name: Dreadball Xtreme Xpansion

201947.description:
The ultimate tour for the Galaxy’s Greatest Sport, as teams venture across the quarantined Hazard System, vying it out for the Challenge Cup Title. From games played in utter darkness to matches dodging deadly lava flows, it isn’t just the other team that presents a challenge in this contest! Four brutal new MVPs complete the excitement. Your campaigns will never be the same again!

This set contains:

40 Page DreadBall Challenge Cup Rulebook
Challenge Cup Map
Challenge Cup Card Deck
Challenge Cup Counter Sheet
MVP Alo-khan
MVP Blitz
MVP Eko'o
MVP Hexan

Copies of DreadBall, DreadBall Xtreme and the DreadBall Xtreme Xpansion will be required to use the various parts of this set.
201947.name: Dreadball Challenge Cup

201948.name: Mjölnir (Nr. 2 - 1981)
201948.description:
No. 2, Q2 (?) 1981. A5. Include:

Orion - revised Traveller-fighting system
Sorcerer's Hat
BASIC program to generate Traveller-worlds
They norns
Spökspalten
Oasis (D & D adventure)
Guild Voice

201949.name: Superheroes 1
201949.description:
Author's blurb:

Superheroes are ordinary people like everyone else. They just won the super power lottery and can perform heroic deeds. With this ability comes a great responsibility.

User summary:

A terrorist has set their sights on one of the leading scientists of Omega. The heroes must use all their abilities to defeat the insane plan. Exploration and self-sacrifice will be required.

Scenario incorporates elements from a reality-television series.

201950.name: Superheroes 2
201950.description:
Author's blurb:

Denmark's superheroes are back! After the thrilling confrontation against the so-called "Future Heroes", our Super Heroes are now ready for a new adventure where they will once again battle crime and corruption.

User summary:

A woman's corpse is found bearing curious marks and lesions all over the body. The superheroes must solve the crime with style but the need to look good doing it.

Scenario incorporates elements from a reality-television series.

201951.name: The Chronicles of the Lejendary Earth: Noble Kings and Dark Lands
201951.description:
From the back of the book:
Halt Varlot!
Who tresspasses on Barcalonian lands?

This won't be a problem for your avatar the next time you run into an unknown sentry! Armed with Noble Kings and Dark Lands, you'll know not only where you are and who the local heads of government might be, but the native customs, the religious sects, and the right answer to give a guard of this nature. Packed with information, this book is the definitive work of the continents of Varan and Apphir in the Lejendary Earth. In it you will find backgrounds on the kingdoms of this area, as well as local myths, legends, monsters and mysteries galore.
Adventuring in Apphir or Varan?...
...then this book is a must for player and Lejend Master alike.

201952.name: Superheroes 3
201952.description:
Author's blurb:

The simple fact is that harsh methods are necessary not only to survive, but to protect the citizens. For too long we have let the enemy grow strong in our backyard. We have turned a deaf ear to their preaching of death and destruction. The enemy, who will stop at nothing, is at the door. Will they understand anything except harsh action against them?

User summary:

Scenario incorporates elements from a reality-television series.

201953.name: Biene Maja: Honig-Wettlauf
201953.description:
Two to five players race to the hive in the center of the board with both their characters. The active player rolls two color dice. If they show different colors, the player picks one of them and each player can move their pieces to an adjacent flower of that color (if there is one). If both show the same color, only the active player gets to move two fields. If one of them shows a spiderweb, the player can place one of the spiders into another player's field to block the path. Two spiderwebs mean the player can move both spiders and move by two flowers on top of it.
First player who gets both pieces into the hive is the winner.

201954.name: Mjölnir (Nr. 3 - 1981)
201954.description:
No. 3, Q3 (?) 1981. A5. Among others:

Journalist - new Traveller Class
En Garde in Swedish
Random Name Tables
Icy $ - Traveller scenario
Tafkol - a Runequest-cult
The last stop - adventure

201955.name: Shadyvill
201955.description:
Author's blurb:

A scenario of horror about the worst and best in people.

Shaken from deep introspection, you realize the rain is drumming against the window. Outside the old bus winds its way through the dark landscape. Your thoughts wander again, back to recent hellish events. The conflict inside is stronger than ever, and - still of divided mind - you decide you must again return to Shadyvill. Back to the site of the Morrys Center for Maladjusted Youth...

"I won't survive... I won't survive..." You hear yourself mumbling.

User summary:

The scenario is distributed as a ZIP archive containing five PDF files - the primary scenario file and four files with print-and-play handouts.

201956.name: The MEGA Role-Playing System Game Screen
201956.description: It is a 6 fold screen with many charts from the book, including: 5.11 bows and crossbows, 5.12 Missile weapons, 2.2 Difficulty levels, 4.1 Real encumbrance, 5.6 combat, 5.10 melee adjustments, 5.13 missile adjustments, 4.2 Real Damage, 5.1 Melee weapons, 2.20 mounted combat, 5.9 Getting up during combat, 5.7 criticals, 5.8 Fumbles, the other side has a picture of caves, monsters, a village, adventuring troupe, rainbow, etc.

201957.description:
Diamonds: The Thief, a mini-expansion for Diamonds, consists of a 60mm circular token ("The Thief") that moves around the table whenever the clubs suit action is taken. Note that this action is different when playing with Diamonds: The Thief rules.

NOTE: This new clubs suit action is mandatory for all official Diamonds Tournaments starting after the Gen Con 2016 tournament.
201957.name: Diamonds: The Thief
boardgamepodcastepisode: #24: The HYPE Episode! Gen Con 2016 Preview; Rocky Road a la Mode preview; Among the Stars on tap

201958.name: Terror in the Forest of Gizzick
201958.description:
From the adventure's cover:

An adventure for Characters Levels 3 – 5

Something has been terrorizing farms and houses that lie in or near the Forest of Gizzick. People are being killed, livestock is being killed or stolen, and buildings are burning down. Even though no one has seen the cause of this terror, rumors abound. Some believe goblins or other creatures are to blame. Others think a demon is involved, yet other people worry this is the beginning of an invasion from some unknown evil. Does your party have what it takes to find and stop the terror?

201959.name: Gran Turismo Sport
videogamehonor: 2016 Game Critics Best Racing Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Gamescom Best Playstation Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Gamescom Best Racing Game of the Year Nominee
201959.description:
GT Sport will include three game modes: "Campaign", "Sports Mode" and "Arcade Mode". Both offline and online racing will feature in the game. The game has been described as different from the "Prologue" titles seen in the past in the series and will feature more content. Unlike its predecessors, the game does not feature dynamic weather and day-night cycle. However, players still have the option to modify the race's time of day before entering the race.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gran_Turismo_Sport Gran Turismo Sport]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

201960.name: Backstab: Danse Macabre expansion
201960.description:
This is the first expansion for Backstab.

The Danse Macabre expansion include 4 completely new characters with unique abilities and introduce the new "events" card mechanisism to push the plots and double dealing at a whole new level!

201962.name: Mjölnir (Nr. 4 - 1982)
201962.description:
No. 4, winter 1982. A5. Contents include:

Orion Part III
Chaos Plants to Runequest
Spökspalten
Sorcerer's Hat
EP in the D & D
The governor (AD & D adventure)

201963.name: Children of the Magi
201963.description:
From the introduction:

Among the people of the Persian Empire were the Magi, a special group of people who served the emperors as priests and scholars. Many also had amazing powers they used to help the empire. With these important jobs, the Magi grew very powerful in the empire. Each year, the Magi would go from town to town in the empire and find children with special gifts and bring them to Persepolis to train to become Magi.

In this game, you will tell a story together about the days of the Persian Empire, pretending to be young Magi in training. You live in Persepolis and know well the halls of the emperor’s palace. You listened to your parents’ teachings, and know the right ways to act and the importance of telling the truth, although sometimes you are still tempted to tell lies and act badly. You’ll explore the rooms of the palace and help the people you find there as part of your training, and eventually, if you do well and avoid drug, you may graduate and become one of the Magi.

User summary:

The game is designed for one adult game master and about four children from the ages of five through eight. The resolution mechanism uses card flips compared to character traits in a process reminiscent of the board game "Memory".

201964.name: Urgent Watch
201964.description:
From the introduction:

Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, 18FEB91 H05:37Z (H08:37Local)

Warning Order from NAVSPECVARGRU to OIC/Detachment Echo, 3rd Platoon, SEAL Team 3 [E/3rd Plt.]

TOP SECRET: Code Word Urgent Watch

E/3rd Plt. will immediately report to the Central Command, Allied Forces, Riyadh, to receive final operation orders.

Preliminary operation order follows:
E/3rd Plt. will undertake a Strategic reconnaissance and Evaluation Mission behind NICE [Forward Line of Own Troops].

Mission objective is Iraqi Complex KL-330-5A, Position:33° 18'05N, 40° 40'30W (DMA REF:ONC G4 1990). The aim of the operation is to determine the function and threat levels of KL- 330-5A.

User summary:

Scenario is distributed as a ZIP archive containing sixteen PDF documents: a 28-page scenario document, and 62 pages of print-and-play handouts (most, but not all, handouts need be used during play).

201965.name: A Friend In Need (1989)
201965.description:
A One-round Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Game Tournament With a Happy Ending

From the introduction:

Romance is alive in the Land of Avalon. Good Prince Gallant has searched his princedom over for the most beautiful woman in the world to take as his bride. His pronouncement has gone over Avalon, and many women have hoped to be the one he chooses. Though he has seen many beauties, he has married none of them, certain that the most beautiful woman must be in his princedom. But now, after searching so hard, he feels he has found her. Alas, if he is not careful, he may lose her before the autumn leaves turn to brown.

User summary:

Distributed as a 29-page scenario with an additional 6 pages of player handouts (including pre-generated characters).

201966.name: Wasted
201966.description:
User Summary

A post-apocalyptic rogue-like FPS which sees the player entering randomly generated underground vaults in search of the fabled Booze while killing the resident denizens and not lingering long enough to attract the attention of hunters.

201967.name: Edge of Nowhere
videogamehonor: 2016 Global Game Awards Best VR Game of the Year Nominee
201967.description:
Follow the trail of a missing expedition that leads across the treacherous mountains of Antarctica. Scale massive ice walls and travel deep into alien caves in this unsettling psychological thriller. In Edge of Nowhere, nothing is what it seems and the unexpected lurks from all sides.

Source: The Developer Website.

201968.name: XCavalypse
201968.description:
Months after a zombie apocalypse, a displaced group of survivors have come to the task to take back the city in an unconventional way, not with machetes and shotguns, but with a fleet of excavators!

Source: The Game Website.

201969.name: Airfix Battles: Bonus Force Deck 1
201969.description:
From the publisher:

Prepare to top up your troops, call in reinforcements and commit your reserves for your favourite Airfix Battles forces, with this brand new set of 24 bonus Force Cards for the Airfix Battles wargame.

With a huge variety of British, American and German troops, it features specialists like the Allied Bazooka team, the 6-pounder anti-tank gun, a ten man squad of Tommies with anti-tank Piats, as well as experienced leaders like the Commando Sergeant, Allied Captain and unit of Veterans.

You'll also find a huge variety of specialist Allied vehicles such as the Sherman Calliope tank with its rocket launchers, the M8 Greyhound armoured car, or the Churchill Crocodile battle tank, plus a host of classic world war two vehicles.

For the Axis forces you'll be able to deploy an array of fearsome vehicles and armour like Michael Wittman's Tiger, featuring the ace German tank commander, the Panther battle tank, the SDKFZ 222 armoured car and the deadly Tiger II King Tiger!

201970.name: Kiddie Kards
201970.description:
Kiddie Cards is described on the box as "Colorful, Educational, Entertaining Cards for Children. The 55-card deck has backs in five different colors (red, orange, yellow, blue and green), while the front of each card has an illustration of what the rules call "items which surround every child in his everyday life".

The cards are clearly aimed at what the rule card calls "small fry", and are primarily educational and aimed at very young children.

The game does not come with fixed rules, and suggests that children may wish to devise their own games. The one game suggested is to deal the cards equally to the players, and have each child discard in turn. The next child may not discard unless he or she identifies the image on that card.

Alex G. Malloy (American Games: Comprehensive Collector's Guide; Krause 1999) dates this as circa 1970s, but the illustrations of household appliances and vehicles have more of a 1950s look to them.

201971.description:
It is far in the distant future: the year 2000. As the visionaries of the 1980s predicted, all facets of life from the government's most secretive mainframes to the local power grid and even your humble screen door are connected together and just waiting for hackers to break into them to prove they are the best of the best. Vying with each other for the most epic hacks and constantly striving to stay one step ahead of the authorities, hackers wage secret cyberbattles unknown to the average user.

Super Hack Override is a fast-paced card swapping card game to determine the next Supreme Super Hacker. Show off your hacking skills and prove that you have what it takes to be the next Supreme Super Hacker by proxy swapping your way to victory. Shield yourself from your opponents by using protection cards, hack into government facilities to get the most points, all while avoiding Hacker Jail! Win by getting to a certain amount of cred based on the number of hackers playing or by being the last hacker standing.

The game features play for 2-6 players in 5-25 minutes. The game consists of 25 cards that comprise 11 different hacks, each of whom provide either protection, the power to proxy swap, or are government facilities.
201971.name: Super Hack Override
boardgamepodcastepisode: Interview Special #21: Nick Kopp (Weird Giraffe Games - Super Hack Override)
The First Roll - What's New on Kickstarter? - Episode 66: Thursday, September 15th

201972.name: Contract with the Devil
201972.description:
User Summary

Solve puzzle mini-games to achieve objects that will get your daughter back from the devil who stole her.

201973.name: Trivial Pursuit: Star Trek 50th Anniversary Edition
201973.description: Boldly celebrate 50 years of Star Trek when you answer 1,200 questions from all 5 Star Trek television shows and the first 10 Star Trek movies. Categories include: Crew Members, Locations, Starfleet, Aliens, Ships and Science & Technology. The cards and die store inside a collectible Shuttlecraft case.

201974.name: Gnumz: Masters of Defence
201974.description:
User Summary

A tower defence game that uses the four elements to block a variety of enemies. The elements are arranged in four areas so that some traps affect a couple of elemental enemies. Traps must be matched up to invaders for best results.

201975.name: Super Mario Bros. pelastavat prinsessan!
201975.description: Roll-and-move where players are trying to reach the Princess with both their characters, Mario and Luigi. Player pawns return to start if their square is reached by another player piece or Koopa.

201977.name: Kampf dem Zufall
201977.description:
Each player has his own game board and four pawns. The goal of the game is to get all meeples off his board, either by moving them past space 49 or by getting them on the board of another player. Movement is determined by two dice. The player may choose to move two pawns with the result of each die, or one meeple with the added result of both dice. If a meeple gets on a space of it's own color it stays there, but if it gets on the space of another color, it moves to the game board of this color onto the space of the same number and is now controlled by the player of this color. Instead of rolling the dies, he may move a meeple of his own color ten spaces ahead, if it lands on a space of his own color.

The first player to get all pawns off his board, wins the game.

201978.name: Mandate Archive Collection 2011
201978.description:
User summary:

A collection of the Mandate Archive 2011 entries for Stars Without Number:

• Bannerjee Construction Solutions
• The Bruxelles-class Battlecruiser
• The Cabals of Hydra Sector
• The Dust
• Martial Arts
• The Qotah
• The Red Sangha Mercenary Corps

Also includes details on The Judicators and their psychic discipline, Judication.

201979.name: The Sims 4 - Dine Out
201979.description:
User Summary

Dine Out allows a player to operate restaurants in the virtual neighborhood.

201980.name: GAIN
201980.description:
GAIN is a first person stealth game with perma-death. Freeze guards, slow time and collect the documents in eight frustrating levels without dying. Classic stealth game with no saves. Once you die, its back to the beginning....

Source: The Game Website.

201981.name: Vroomist
201981.description:
User Summary

Vroomist is a physics based game about engineering, construction and survival in harsh multi-player arenas.

201982.name: Albi Regionální kvízy Praha
201982.description:
From the series of quiz games that tests players' knowledge of different Czech regions.

In this game the players will try their knowledge of Prague in four different categories: History, Culture, Places of Interest and Miscellaneous.

Players roll the die and move around the board, landing on a spot where they will answer a question from a card. If they answer correctly, they get to keep the card. Whoever collects cards from all categories first, is the winner.

201983.name: GentleMoon 2
201983.description:
User Summary

The objective is to fly to the Moon and get away from the zombies.

201984.name: Ace of Words
201984.description:
User Summary

In a mixture of Boggle and Scrabble, you make all the words possible out of a set rack of letters. Your rank is compared with others across the world. Certain words will unlock hints (which are rather all-out tells); there is a time component.

201986.name: Automaton: Mechanical Characters in the World of Airship Daedalus
201986.description:
Publisher Blurb:

This free supplement allows players and GMs to add mechanical characters into their Airship Daedalus pulp adventure campaigns!

Includes a short primer on mechanical characters in pulp settings, their advantages and weaknesses, and construction rules for three basic types of mechanicals:

Robot - The most basic mechanical character, extremely specialized.
Android - Advanced mechanical character approximating a human form.
Construct - Golems and other servitors imbued with "life" through science or magic.

Complete with Lifeline tables for character generation and a special table for encounters with Electromagnetic Fields!

201987.name: Josie
201987.description:
From the introduction:

This story is separated into two time-lines, one that is set in 1985 and another in 2045. The frame, the timeline you will actually be playing in, is 2045. However the story you primarily will be exploring is set in 1985 and forward, where you will follow the life of Josie, a young prawn trying to survive the harsh life in District 9. Josie will be defined as a character throughout the narration of the game, and her story is yet to be discovered by the players.

201988.name: Robin's Friends
201988.description:
From the introduction:

Robin’s Friends is a short scenario with a lot of emotions about the beauty of friendship and the difficulty to communicate, even if your intentions are good. It's about what happens when your inability to see others suddenly leads to the realization that it's too late to known them. But if you had the chance to do it again, how would you change it?

User summary:

A "Jeepform" game for one game master and three players.

201989.name: Corpse Run: Take It or Leave It
201989.description:
Author's blurb:

The cleric is down after she was hit by a death ray from the necromancer Bargle. Moments later the elf flees head over heels through the just-discovered secret door. With a dead cleric in tow, low hit points, and only a few spells remaining, you try to find a way out of the dungeon before the necromancer and his minions can catch you.

The scenario is about a group of adventurers trying to slip past traps, monsters, and obstacles in order to get out of a classic dungeon before they are caught. They will have to be resourceful to escape alive.

User summary:

This tournament scenario uses pre-generated characters.

201991.description:
Take the role of a Video Games development Studio. Employ designers, artists and programmers to make the best game you can.

2-4 Players hire staff, give them ideas, then get those ideas into the game - whilst avoiding industrial espionage from your opponents.

Also, use the free app after the game to see how your game comes out.

Gameplay: The game uses multi-use cards so that all of the staff that are available to hire can also be used as money - to pay for the staff - or as ideas - to increase the likelyhood that they will be able to add something to your game design.

On a player's turn they use their 2 actions to either draw new cards, put an employee into play (paying with cards,) add an idea, or roll the dice to get that employees idea into the game.

This is augmented by a wide variety of action cards that will help or hinder your and your opponent's progress respectively. For instance, hire an employee into a rival player's company to employ some corporate espionage!

You can also gain benefits from reaching communal and private milestones / achievements as the game progresses.
201991.name: Creative Differences: The Video Game Development Card Game

201992.name: Project Nos
201992.description:
Project Nos is a real time dice drag race that attempts to capture the high performance rush of street racing.

1-4 Players start the game with a car and 3 dice and modify their cars by selecting modification cards and taking the associated dice.

A six card track is laid out and, on go, players roll two dice at a time trying to match the number on the track. Once a number matches, player places it in their space on the track card and grabs a new dice.

First player to complete the track wins!

201993.name: Heroes Weekly (Vol 5, Issue 22 - Clevennius)
201993.description:
From publisher blurb:

Each week Avalon Games offers a new issue of Heroes Weekly.

Packed full of great superhero fun, each issue offers a short adventure, an NPC, or some game mechanics for the Heroes Wear Masks system. While compatible with the HWM system, you can always use the information presented in each issue for other superhero games—just monkey around with the stats and mechanics to fit the system you are using.

This week: The immortal Ruler of Emerald! Comes with some Roman Robot Warriors as well.

201994.name: En5ider (Issue 81 - Jun 2016)
rpgissuearticle: The Alchemist: Where Madness Meets Magic
201994.description:
From publisher blurb:

The alchemist has an almost scientific approach to magic, able to make alchemical Discoveries. Will your alchemist become immune to poison, or discover the Elixir of Life? Will you delve into the Science of Creation and build a homunculus, or research the Science of Destruction and devise explosives? A full 5th Edition player class only on EN5ider!

201995.name: Evig
201995.description:
User summary:

Characters in this Danish-language game are combatants in a reality television show in some future period. The action involves combat but also allows characters to form (and break) alliances to get ahead. Combat resolution uses custom cards.

The game is distributed as a ZIP archive including one PDF game document and four PDF print-and-play components, one of which includes the game cards.

201996.name: Road Rash
201996.description:
From publisher blurb:

Road Rash! Saved from a near-fatal crash during one of his professional motorcycle stunt shows, Wayne Stetson’s upper body has been cybernetically augented, and his lower body replaced with a motorcycle-like prosthetic. Road Rash is aggressive, forthright, and bitter towards others more fortunate than himself. Financially ruined by his medical expenses and the loss of his celebrated career, Road Rash has become a daring and greedy thief specializing in highway robbery!

"FOE FILE #06: ROAD RASH" contains a briefing from TEACHER, the sentient computer system of the Crusader Citadel (headquarters of the Crusaders superhero team), color character sheets with complete stats for Road Rash in VILLAINS AND VIGILANTES and LIVING LEGENDS, background, tactics, personality traits, and choice dialogue!

201997.name: Natural Disaster Animist Aspects
201997.description:
From publisher blurb:

Why should an animist stop at embodying natural landmarks, animals, and the seasons? Take on the guise of four devastating natural disasters: avalanches, earthquakes, tornadoes, and wildfires, with this new expansion for the Patreon-funded Animist base class.

201998.name: TITechCorp Equipment Flyer #1
201998.description:
From publisher blurb:

Are you tired of you agents having inferior weapons?

Tired of you lackeys falling like flies to the superheroes of the world?

Tired of those dim witted Until agents having better equipment than you agents?

Then you have come to the right place here at TITechCorp we are dedicated to creating the best weapons, armor and other equipment money can buy.

So stop by today and pick up the latest blaster or force belt and get a jump on those pesky do-gooders.

And remember your satisfaction is guaranteed or we won’t see you again.

Small list of equipment to add to your Champions campaign includes Hero Designer files.

201999.name: TITechCorp Equipment Flyer #2
201999.description:
From publisher blurb:

Are you tired of you agents having inferior weapons?

Tired of you lackeys falling like flies to the superheroes of the world?

Tired of those dim witted Until agents having better equipment than you agents?

Then you have come to the right place here at TITechCorp we are dedicated to creating the best weapons, armor and other equipment money can buy.

So stop by today and pick up the latest blaster or force belt and get a jump on those pesky do-gooders.

And remember your satisfaction is guaranteed or we won’t see you again.

Small list of equipment to add to your Champions campaign includes Hero Designer files.

202000.description:
The Big Apple is a “building” game for from 2 to 4 players. Players recreate the “history” of New York City, from its earliest years up to modern times, by slowly constructing more and bigger buildings, parks and cultural centers. Each player is looking to amass wealth and political power, all leading to his being elected Mayor of New York.

Players win by earning Victory Points. There are several paths to gaining VP - wealth and political power are the two main roads - and players must choose which of these they will take to win.

The Big Apple requires players to master various types of games all at the same time. The building portion of the game requires players to adapt spatially to the changing environs for in each of the three eras of the game. In addition there is a population management aspect where new immigrants are constantly coming ashore and need to find housing. This leads to a constant friction between the building of housing to hold voters... I mean population versus the creation of lucrative businesses versus the migration of the populace into the boroughs of Brooklyn, Queens & The Bronx. Finally the game is full of dirty political tricks that can set your opposition back and create opportunities for you.

The Big Apple is for 2-4 players and plays in about 45 minutes per player. It is easy to learn but full of nuances that make mastery slightly more difficult.
